## Biosolids Haulage and Disposal Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

### Notice Details

**Publication Date**: July 23, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: August 8, 2024, 2:00 PM (14:00:00)
**Solicitation Number**: WS4700042214

### Contract Details

 The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for haulage and disposal of biosolids at the Water Pollution Treatment Plant, Canadian Forces Base, Trenton (ON). 

**Scope of Work**: 
The contractor will be responsible for all labour, material, and equipment needed for the removal and application/disposal of aerobically digested biosolids at the Water Pollution Treatment Plant.

### Key Dates

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 30, 2026

### Tendering Method
This is a competitive bid process, open to all interested bidders. The lowest-priced bid that meets the requirements will be selected.

### Evaluation Criteria
The bid will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Contracting Details

* **Procurement Category**: Services (SRV)
* **Trade Agreements**: Bidders are encouraged to adhere to the designated free-trade agreements.
* **Payment Terms**: The contracting entity will provide payment Terms in accordance with the issued contract.

### Contact Information

For further information and assistance, please contact:
Shannon Yang, SPAC/PSPC
Email: [shannon.yang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shannon.yang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: Not available
Fax: Not available
Address: Not available

### Posting Information

This tender posting is available on the Government of Canada's procurement system, Ariba.

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20409843?extsite=MjA0MDk4NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please ensure to review the bid package and RFSO in its entirety before bidding.   
[ back](https://www.canada.ca/en/treasury-board-secretariat/services/tender-notices/register-business/trade-goods-services/trade-agreements.html)
